content: **crocheted top/vest in drops safran the piece is worked top down with treble crochets v-neck and fan-patterned edges sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #scallopblissvest drops design pattern e-379 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 200-250-250-250-300-350 g colour 72 chalk **buttons** drops buttons no 802 3 items in all sizes **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge** 22 treble crochets in width and 12 row in height on hook size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size -------------------------------------------------------
